> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Bev7787 said:
> 
> 
> Oh... I have a complete model of Vandenberg though without textures, am I able to release it by itself?
> 

It is your model so I think you should be able to do whatever you want with it. Technically this is 'The Real <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> in KSP', <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> being Kennedy Space Center so I don't think they'll be hitting Vandy for awhile. Copies are not uncommon in the KSP modding world and gives players the ability to pick and choose what they want to use. Content for <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>/<abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> is severely lacking so any "real" content put out by anyone will be embraced by me and probably many others.
NM about that, just contacted Triston about it.
